text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
extension 2..*ExtensionExtension
extension:testName 1..1ExtensionName of the TestScript to execute
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"testName"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:bindEachTarget 1..1ExtensionVariable name in the executed test that the input value will be bound to
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"bindEachTarget"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:allMustPass 0..1ExtensionDetermines whether all runs of the executed subtest must pass for this assertion to succeed
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"allMustPass"
value[x] 0..1booleanValue of extension
extension:bindVariable 0..*ExtensionBinding of a source TestScript variable to a target TestScript variable
extension 2..*ExtensionExtension
extension:bindSource 1..1ExtensionExecuting TestScript variable name that provides the value
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"bindSource"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:bindTarget 1..1ExtensionExecuted TestScript variable name that receives the value
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"bindTarget"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
url 1..1uri"bindVariable"
value[x] 0..0
url 1..1uri"https://fhir-crucible.github.io/testscript-engine-ig/StructureDefinition/assert-subtest-each"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: AssertSubtestEach
description: Execute a TestScript instance as a subtest for each of a set of inputs.

element.definition: Execute a TestScript instance as a subtest for each of a set of inputs.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: Name of the TestScript to execute
element.definition: An Extension

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html) for a list).

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.short: Variable name in the executed test that the input value will be bound to
